banners.title: Efficient Soap Cutting and Stamping Solution
Our Capabilities
banners.details: Ostech, with our location spanning more than 50,000 square feet and a team of well-trained, skilled employees, offers a diversified selection of solutions that cater to various industries. Our state-of-the-art facility allows us to deliver high-quality products and services, leveraging cutting-edge technology and expertise to meet the evolving needs of our clients. From customized manufacturing to innovative engineering services, Ostech is committed to providing effective, reliable solutions that drive success and growth for businesses worldwide.

products.title: Slat Conveyors
products.details:
Slat conveyors consist of endless chains, driven by electric motors operating through reduction gears and sprockets, with attached spaced slats to carry objects that would damage a belt because of sharp edges or heavy weights.


Slat conveyors can be used in severe applications such as handling hot, oily, or abrasive material where rubber or canvas belt conveyors are impractical. Slat conveyors can be made of wood, formed steel or structural steel slats. The type of slat is determined by size, weight, and properties of the product being conveyed. Slat conveyors are extremely versatile in handling a multitude of products, from raw materials, through manufacturing process, to finished products. Conveyors have slats attached to double-strand steel sidebar bushed roller chains and are available in all practical widths, lengths and heights
products.homeDetail: Driven by electric motors and consists of endless chain used where rubber or canvas belt conveyors are impractical.
keyFeature: High efficiency and reliability in material transport
Reduces manual handling, improving worker safety
Customizable design to suit various applications
Easy maintenance for long-term operation
Cost-effective solution for material handling needs
Durable construction for reliable performance

products.title: Roller Conveyors
products.details:
To help industry convey light or heavy goods, Om Sai Enterprises offers custom roller bed conveyors. These roller conveyors are available in both chain- and belt-driven models.


All roller conveyors are ruggedly constructed for dependable operation and are available in a variety of standard roller bed conveyor configurations.


﻿Roller conveyors are the proper choice when you need to side load, push off, accumulate a product or adjust pressure on carrying rollers. We offer five different types; chain driven, belt driven, line shaft driven, accumulation, or non-powered (gravity). Using roller conveyors instead of slider bed conveyors adds versatility to the type of transfers, diverters and stops that can be used in a system. Rollers are available in mild steel, galvanized, plastic or stainless steel.
products.homeDetail: Available in chain and belt-driven models, ruggedly constructed along with various standard roller bed conveyor configurations.
keyFeature: High efficiency and reliability in material transport.
Reduces manual handling, improving worker safety.
Customizable design to suit various applications.
Easy maintenance for long-term operation.

products.title: Retractable Conveyors
products.details:
This is a special conveyor belt whose main feature is that it can retract itself to lay products over a flat surface. This way, the products are laid gently, even over another conveyor belt.


Retractable conveyor systems are used in many industries, but most often in food and pharmaceutical. It doesn’t matter if you’re familiar with retractable conveyors using the terms transpositors, shuttles, dealers or reciprocators; one thing is certain: speed is the determining factor in its performance.


To further explain these devices, imagine dealers as dealing out rows of products, transpositors as transporting product in another direction, shuttles moving product in a number of directions back and forth, and so on.

For the food processing industry, retractable conveyors need to be really fast and reliable. They must also be able to handle frequent wash-downs.
products.homeDetail: Retracting itself so that products can be laid gently on a flat surface is the main feature , mostly used in food and pharmaceutical industry.
keyFeature: High efficiency and reliability in material transport,Reduces manual handling, improving worker safety,Customizable design to suit various applications,Easy maintenance for long-term operation

products.title: Robotics Arm for Pick-n-Place
products.details:
Pick-and-place operations, such as palletizing, are one of the many applications of robotic manipulators. They are often employed to increase productivity in a setting where tasks can be repetitive and laborious such as packaging and assembly operations.

Application can also be in removing humans from hazardous work, such as the use of robotic arms in nuclear decommissioning tasks and the increased level of intelligence integrated in some robotic arms of today means they can even work in collaboration with humans While the operations of a pick-and-place robot can be customized by appropriate programming, developing an accurate model to simulate the motions of the robot can be used to determine the reach and efficiency of the robot, estimate cycle time, and convey potential collision paths without any actual implementation on hardware. This can save time and money and also prevent possible damage to the robot.
products.homeDetail: One of the robotic manipulators used for replacing work force in hazardous operations like nuclear decommissioning task. It is based on Fanuc Robotic Arm with servo driven systems.
keyFeature: High efficiency and reliability in material transport
Reduces manual handling, improving worker safety
Cost-effective solution for material handling needs

products.homeDetail: Use in antiquated process of scrubbing tooling and plates, eliminates menace of conventional methods. Heating rod is used for nozzle cleaning process

products.title: Rotary Bagger
products.details:
The rotary bagger represents a cutting-edge solution for high-volume packaging operations, designed to improve productivity and minimize downtime. Unlike traditional packaging methods, which often involve cumbersome and time-consuming manual labor, this machine automates the process, providing a consistent and efficient output.

One of its standout features is its enhanced cleaning system. The rotary bagger eliminates the outdated scrubbing tools and plates commonly used in older packaging machines. This advancement significantly reduces the risk of contamination and improves overall hygiene standards, making it ideal for industries with strict quality control requirements.

To ensure the system operates seamlessly, the rotary bagger is equipped with a specialized heating rod that aids in the nozzle cleaning process. This technology ensures that nozzles are kept free from blockages and residues, maintaining optimal performance and preventing costly downtime.

With its robust design and innovative features, the rotary bagger is an essential investment for businesses looking to boost efficiency, reduce operational risks, and achieve higher throughput in their packaging processes.
products.homeDetail: The rotary bagger offers an advanced solution for packaging, designed to streamline operations while enhancing efficiency and safety
keyFeature: Reduces manual labor for improved safety.
High-efficiency packaging with consistent results.
Customizable design for different materials.
Easy maintenance for reduced downtime
Cost-effective with high ROI.
Durable construction for reliable performance.

aboutcompanies.title: Transforming Ideas With Innovations
aboutcompanies.description:
Safety, Quality, Excellence.

With our excellent reputation, we are proud to be the best low-cost SPM (Special Purpose Machineries) builder for Detergent, Pharmaceuticals, Paints, FMCG, and Chemical industries worldwide. Founded by the dynamic Mr. Anil Singh, OSTECH has been serving the global market for 20+ years.


Our core values lie in the true meaning of teamwork, dedication and delivering excellence. We strive to maintain these values throughout the entire workflow from start to finish, thus guaranteeing 100% customer delight.
aboutcompanies.longDescription:
Safety, Quality, Excellence.

With our excellent reputation, we are proud to be the best low-cost SPM (Special Purpose Machineries) builder for Detergent, Pharmaceuticals, Paints, FMCG, and Chemical industries worldwide. Founded by the dynamic Mr. Anil Singh, OSTECH has been serving the global market for 20+ years.


Our core values lie in the true meaning of teamwork, dedication and delivering excellence. We strive to maintain these values throughout the entire workflow from start to finish, thus guaranteeing 100% customer delight. Our Success is driven by a Customer-centric approach, where we prioritize understanding the specific requirements of our clients. This enables us to design and build special purpose machineries that not only meet but exceed industry standards.

manufactureprocesses.title: 1. Requirements Analysis
manufactureprocesses.description:
Understand Client Needs:

- Product type (e.g., bottles, boxes)

- Production rate (e.g., items per minute)

- Packaging type (e.g., cartons, cases)

Define Scope:

- Clarify machine functions

- Integration requirements with existing systems

- Constraints (space, budget, regulations)

manufactureprocesses.title: 2. Conceptual Design
manufactureprocesses.description:
Preliminary Layouts:

- Sketch initial concepts or create basic 3D models

- Decide machine type (rotary, linear, robotic, etc.)

Material Flow Diagram: Outline how materials move through the machine

Feasibility Study: Evaluate design practicality, cost, and timeline

manufactureprocesses.title: 3. Detailed Engineering Design
manufactureprocesses.description:
Mechanical Design:

- Create detailed 3D CAD models for all components

- Design mechanisms for specific functions (e.g., picking, placing, sealing)

- Choose materials and tolerances

Electrical & Control System Design:

- Design electrical schematics and select components (PLCs, sensors, actuators)

- Plan software for motion control and human-machine interface (HMI)

Safety & Standards:

- Ensure compliance with safety regulations (e.g., OSHA, CE marking)

- Include emergency stops, guards, and interlocks

manufactureprocesses.title: 4. Prototyping & Simulation
manufactureprocesses.description:
Virtual Simulation:

- Use simulation software to test material flow, speeds, and interactions

- Optimize processes and identify bottlenecks

Prototype Manufacturing:

- Build key modules or mechanisms for testing

manufactureprocesses.title: 5. Procurement
manufactureprocesses.description:
Material Sourcing:

- Order raw materials, standard components, and custom-manufactured parts

Vendor Management: Collaborate with suppliers to ensure quality and timely delivery

manufactureprocesses.title: 6. Manufacturing
manufactureprocesses.description:
Fabrication:

- Manufacture parts (e.g., frames, rollers, cams) using CNC machining, laser cutting, or welding

- Ensure parts meet design tolerances

Assembly:

- Assemble mechanical components, electrical panels, and subsystems

- Install actuators, sensors, and control systems

manufactureprocesses.title: 7. Integration
manufactureprocesses.description:
Component Integration:

- Assemble the complete machine

- Connect mechanical, electrical, and control systems

Software Installation:

- Program the PLC, motion controllers, and HMI

- Integrate communication protocols (Ethernet/IP, Modbus)

manufactureprocesses.title: 8. Testing & Validation
manufactureprocesses.description:
Dry Run: Test the machine without products to check basic functionality

Performance Testing: Run with products to ensure the machine meets speed, accuracy, and reliability requirements

Safety Testing: Validate all safety features (e.g., guards, sensors)

manufactureprocesses.title: 9. Installation & Commissioning
manufactureprocesses.description:
Site Preparation: Ensure space, power supply, and utilities are ready

On-Site Installation:

  • - Transport and assemble the machine at the client's facility
  • - Align and calibrate the machine

Operational Training: Train operators and maintenance staff

manufactureprocesses.title: 10. Documentation & Handover
manufactureprocesses.description:
Technical Documentation: Provide manuals, drawings, and maintenance guides

Handover: Finalize the project and obtain client sign-off

manufactureprocesses.title: 11. Post-Installation Support
manufactureprocesses.description:
Warranty Support: Offer maintenance and troubleshooting support

Upgrades & Enhancements: Suggest and implement improvements as needed

whychooseus.title: Custom Solutions

whychooseus.title: Versatility in Design
whychooseus.description: Our roller conveyors come in both chain- and belt-driven models, providing flexibility in choosing the right conveyor system for your applications.

whychooseus.title: Varied Types Available
whychooseus.description: Choose from five different types of roller conveyors—chain driven, belt driven, line shaft driven, accumulation, or non-powered (gravity)—offering versatility in handling transfers, diverters, and stops within your system.

whychooseus.title: Material Options
whychooseus.description: Rollers are available in mild steel, galvanized, plastic, or stainless steel, allowing you to select the most suitable material for your specific operational environment.

• Custom-Tailored Production: Our in-house manufacturing ensures that every product is precisely crafted to meet specific client requirements, delivering superior quality and customization.
  • Efficient and Reliable: With manufacturing managed internally, we maintain strict quality control, streamline production, and reduce lead times for faster delivery.

  • Enhanced Flexibility: Internal fabrication allows us to adapt designs and processes quickly, ensuring timely delivery and client satisfaction.

infographics.title: IN HOUSE R&D

  • Competitive Advantage: By managing R&D internally, we accelerate product development cycles and maintain a competitive edge through proprietary advancements.

ourcapabilityservices.title: Case Packer
ourcapabilityservices.description: Partnering with OSTECH Company for your case packing manufacturing needs offers several distinct advantages. With a strong reputation for delivering high-quality, efficient, and reliable solutions, OSTECH ensures that your case packing processes are optimized to meet the demands of your production schedule. Utilizing state-of-the-art technology, advanced machinery, and a skilled workforce, the company provides customized solutions tailored to your specific requirements. Additionally, OSTECH is committed to on-time delivery, cost-effectiveness, and exceptional customer service, making it an ideal partner for all your case packing needs.

ourcapabilityservices.title: Auto Stamper
ourcapabilityservices.description: Opting for an auto stamper solution offers numerous advantages, including enhanced precision and efficiency in high-volume production. With advanced technology and reliable machinery, auto stampers ensure consistent quality and reduce the likelihood of human error, leading to lower operational costs and improved output. The customizable nature of these machines allows for tailored solutions to meet specific production needs, offering flexibility and scalability. Additionally, the automation of stamping processes increases production speed, reduces labor costs, and ensures faster turnaround times, making it an ideal choice for businesses seeking both cost-effective and high-performance stamping solutions.

ourcapabilityservices.title: Manufacturing Design
ourcapabilityservices.description: Choosing a manufacturing design solution offers numerous advantages, including optimized production efficiency and cost savings. By utilizing advanced design techniques and innovative technologies, manufacturing design ensures that products are engineered for maximum performance, reliability, and ease of production. The process allows for precise customization, enabling designs to be tailored to specific requirements, which enhances product quality and minimizes waste. Additionally, a well-crafted manufacturing design improves production timelines, reduces costs through efficient material usage, and facilitates scalability, making it an essential element for businesses looking to improve operational efficiency and competitiveness.

ourcapabilityservices.title: Specialized Conveyor
ourcapabilityservices.description: Opting for a specialized conveyor system brings a range of benefits, including enhanced workflow efficiency and reduced operational downtime. These conveyors are designed to meet the unique needs of specific production lines, allowing for seamless integration into various manufacturing processes. With tailored designs, they improve product handling, increase throughput, and reduce manual labor, all while ensuring optimal safety standards. The automation provided by specialized conveyors streamlines material flow, reduces bottlenecks, and boosts overall productivity. By implementing such systems, businesses can achieve greater consistency, scalability, and cost-efficiency, making specialized conveyors a crucial asset for modern production environments.

ourcapabilityservices.title: Robotics Picks and Place
ourcapabilityservices.description: Implementing robotics for pick and place operations offers significant advantages in modern manufacturing. These automated systems enhance accuracy, speed, and consistency in handling materials, reducing the risk of human error and increasing throughput. Robotics can be tailored to handle a wide range of products, ensuring precision in sorting, assembling, and packaging. By automating repetitive tasks, businesses can reduce labor costs, improve safety, and free up human workers for more complex roles. Additionally, robotics systems can operate continuously, boosting productivity and ensuring faster turnaround times, making them an invaluable solution for businesses seeking to optimize their manufacturing processes.

ourcapabilityservices.title: Technical Service And Support
ourcapabilityservices.description: Opting for technical service and support offers critical advantages in ensuring the seamless operation and longevity of equipment and systems. Expert technical support provides businesses with immediate assistance, minimizing downtime and preventing costly disruptions to production. With skilled professionals available to troubleshoot, maintain, and optimize systems, businesses can improve operational efficiency and extend the lifespan of their equipment. Additionally, ongoing service contracts offer proactive solutions, ensuring that potential issues are addressed before they impact productivity. By investing in reliable technical service and support, companies can enhance system performance, reduce operational risks, and maintain a competitive edge in their industry.

visions.description: To become the biggest brand in the automation industry – the most reliable, efficient, and customer-friendly company in the world.
visions.title: Our Vision

faqs.question: Leading industrial solutions with best machinery
faqs.answer: Redefining industry standards through cutting-edge machinery and innovative industrial solutions, we are committed to delivering excellence and driving success for your business with the finest technology and expertise.

faqs.question: Accurate responses to client’s requirments
faqs.answer: Our commitment lies in providing precise and tailored solutions that perfectly align with our clients' requirements. With a focus on accuracy, we ensure satisfaction by delivering results that meet and exceed expectations.

faqs.question: World’s leader in engineering business
faqs.answer: Pioneering the forefront of the engineering business, we stand as the world's leader, dedicated to innovation, excellence, and driving global advancements.

faqs.question: Ostech has potential to find efficient solutions:
faqs.answer: Ostech is poised to discover and implement efficient solutions, showcasing its potential to lead in problem-solving and innovation within various industries.

corevalues.title: Team Work
corevalues.description: We emphasize on team work because we believe no task is impossible when like-minded people with the same goal come together.

corevalues.title: Dedication
corevalues.description: We strive to achieve success and meet our client's expectations with unconditional dedication and support.

corevalues.title: Deliver Excellence
corevalues.description: We boast to deliver superior quality products, with efficient procedures. Therefore our customers choose to partner with us.
